DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-interventional, multicenter study to evaluate efficacy and safety of intravenous bevacizumab (Avastin) in combination with interferon alpha-2a immunotherapy for first-line treatment in participants with advanced and/or metastatic renal cell cancer (mRCC) in daily routine.
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirmed advanced and/or metastatic renal cell cancer No contraindications for Avastin according to summary of product characteristics (SmPC)
